goals__remit: The HES-SO is the largest University of Applied Sciences and Arts (UAS) in Switzerland and the second largest higher education institution of the country, with more than 21'000 students, 25 schools located in 7 cantons.  HES-SO is organised in six faculties: Business Management & Services, Design & Fine Arts, Engineering & Architecture, Health, Music & Performing Arts and Social Work.  HES-SO offers a large range of education programmes: 46 Bachelor degrees, 22 Master degrees and 255 continuing education courses.  Strongly anchored in the regional economy, HES-SO collaborates closely with SMEs, and its R&D also extends to certain aspects of industrial-scale production.  International collaboration is an integral part of HES-SO’s stragegy for research and education. We have been involved in European Framework Programmes since 1998.
